parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)

x-next.description: A link to the next page of responses

x-codeSamples.source:
from petstore import Petstore, Environment

sdk = Petstore(
    access_token="YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN",
    base_url=Environment.DEFAULT.value,
    timeout=10000
)

result = sdk.pets.list_pets(limit=61)

print(result)

import (
  "fmt"
  "encoding/json"
  "github.com/swagger-api/swagger-petstore/pkg/petstoreconfig"
  "github.com/swagger-api/swagger-petstore/pkg/petstore"
  "github.com/swagger-api/swagger-petstore/pkg/pets"
)

config := petstoreconfig.NewConfig()
client := petstore.NewPetstore(config)


request := pets.Pet{}
request.SetId(int64(123))
request.SetName("Name")

response, err := client.Pets.CreatePets(context.Background(), request)
if err != nil {
  panic(err)
}

fmt.Print(response)

from petstore import Petstore, Environment
from petstore.models import Pet

sdk = Petstore(
    access_token="YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN",
    base_url=Environment.DEFAULT.value,
    timeout=10000
)

request_body = Pet(
    id_=7,
    name="name",
    tag="tag"
)

result = sdk.pets.create_pets(request_body=request_body)

print(result)

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: The id of the pet to retrieve

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

x-codeSamples.source:
from petstore import Petstore, Environment

sdk = Petstore(
    access_token="YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN",
    base_url=Environment.DEFAULT.value,
    timeout=10000
)

result = sdk.pets.show_pet_by_id(pet_id="petId")

print(result)
